name: Stanley J. MATUSKY, an individual; Carolyn Suzanne Matusky, an individual; and Stanley J. Matusky and Carolyn Suzanne Matusky, as husband and wife, Appellants, v. judges: LARSEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Stanley J. MATUSKY, an individual; Carolyn Suzanne Matusky, an individual; and Stanley J. Matusky and Carolyn Suzanne Matusky, as husband and wife, Appellants, v. HAUGH’S POOLS, a foreign corporation; Clover Pool & Supply Company, Inc., a corporation; and Allen Pool Sales & Service v. Daniel FRANTZ and Karen Frantz, his wife; Phillip P. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
ZAPPALA and MONTEMURO, JJ., dissent.
LARSEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
631 A.2d 1001
Stanley J. MATUSKY, an individual; Carolyn Suzanne Matusky, an individual; and Stanley J. Matusky and Carolyn Suzanne Matusky, as husband and wife, Appellants, v. HAUGH’S POOLS, a foreign corporation; Clover Pool & Supply Company, Inc., a corporation; and Allen Pool Sales & Service v. Daniel FRANTZ and Karen Frantz, his wife; Phillip P. Angeletti; Swimline Corporation and Mengo Industries, Inc., a corporation.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 28, 1993.
Decided Oct. 15, 1993.
Reargument Denied Nov. 17, 1993.
